title: Khalid Abdullahi Isse (Powervinx)
body: I am a Somali student who is passionate about technology, programming, and self-improvement. I am studying computer science and working hard to become a professional software engineer and successful entrepreneur in the future. I enjoy learning new programming languages and currently follow a learning path that includes C, JavaScript, and Go. I also like gaming and anime, with Solo Leveling and Kingdom being among my favorites. I am motivated to succeed in my studies, build my skills, and achieve my dream of becoming successful and wealthy one day.
